title.en: Programme of a 1995 Event to Celebrate the twenty fifth anniversary of the formation of the Merched y Wawr Pembrokeshire Area Committee
title.cy: Taflen Rhaglen Nodwedd 1995 i Ddathlu Chwarter Canrif Ffurfio Pwyllgor Rhanbarth Presli a Deau Penfro Merched y Wawr

description.en:
This item was provided to People’s Collection Wales in Welsh only, translation will be provided in due time. 
Taflen Rhaglen Nodwedd gan Gangen Ffynnongroes yn Theatr y Gromlech, Ysgol y Preseli, Tachwedd 15, 1995 i Ddathlu Chwarter Canrif Ffurfio Pwyllgor Rhanbarth Presli a Deau Penfro (Ionawr 21, 1970).
Clawr
